sentences.en: He was not willing to attend the colloquium.
sentences.cn: 他不愿参加这个学术讨论会。

sentences.en: In this context, I am very grateful to President Havel for having organized a colloquium for dialogue recently here in Prague.
sentences.cn: 我非常感谢哈韦尔总统最近在布拉格组织的一次对话式的讨论会。

sentences.en: On colloquium , everybody as follows the view that all respects expressed him.
sentences.cn: 讨论会上, 大家如下诸方面发表了自己的看法.

sentences.en: Publish the speech of this colloquium and summary below.
sentences.cn: 以下刊载这次讨论会的发言及摘要.

sentences.en: Since these early days, I have met Oppenheimer on many occasions and I have been able to see what admirable qualities he had, particularly as a chairman for a discussion or a colloquium.
sentences.cn: 这段时间之后，我遇见过他许多次，因而得以发现他所拥有的令人叹服的特质，特别是他作为研讨会或座谈会主席的才能。

sentences.en: The doctor collectivity that attends colloquium stands up, applause ardently.
sentences.cn: 参加讨论会的医生全体起立, 热烈鼓掌.
